title: Online Evolutionary Control and Q-Learning-Based Decision-Making System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of Control Systems, Introduction to Machine Learning, and Python Programming Experience
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening online control algorithm design capabilities applicable directly to work settings by current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive optimal control strategies for zero-sum games with 85% accuracy using the Q-learning framework
Learners can write system stability analysis reports when implementing online data-driven off-policy learning
Learners can present performance comparison results by applying two monotonic Q-learning algorithms to real-world physical systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
